name: Analyze Bacterial Growth Curve
description: Analyze bacterial growth curve data to determine growth parameters including doubling time and lag phase

params.name: time_points_json
params.description: Time points of measurements in hours (JSON array, e.g., '[0, 1, 2, 3, 4]')

params.name: od_values_json
params.description: Optical density measurements corresponding to each time point (JSON array, e.g., '[0.1, 0.2, 0.4, 0.8, 1.2]')

params.name: strain_name
params.description: Name of the bacterial strain being analyzed

params.name: output_dir
params.description: Directory where output files will be saved
